This directory includes the following third_party software:

* Ant 1.6.5 (The Apache Software License Version 2.0)
  See http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi

* JUnit 3.8.1 (The Common Public License Version 1.0)
  See http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/junit/junit

* eXTensible C 1.10.0 (The GNU GPL version 2)
  See http://cs.nyu.edu/rgrimm/xtc/xtc.jar

* Unicode 5.0.0
  See http://www.unicode.org/Public/UNIDATA/UnicodeData.txt

* jsr166y (Doug Lea's Fork Join Library) is released into the public domain as 
  explained at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain and sited in
  the jsr166y directory.

* ASTGen
  See http://sourceforge.net/projects/astgen

* PLT Utilities
  See http://drjava.org

* Unsigned
  Is unavailable on the web.  It was provided under the BSD license from NaturalBridge , Inc

* Scala 
  See http://www.scala-lang.org/

* Java DB
  See http://developers.sun.com/javadb/

 Details of the appropriate licenses are in their respective directories.
